```{r}
library(tidyverse)
myurl  <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/reisanar/datasets/master/netflixShows.csv"
mydata <- read_csv(myurl)
```

```{r}
mydata %>%
  arrange(-`user rating score`)
```

```{r}
mydata%>%
  group_by(`user rating score`)%>%
  summarize(`release year`)
#Is there a relationship between the rating of a show and the year of release?
#Is there a possible relationship of mature ratings to user scores?
```



```{r}
mydata %>%
  distinct()%>%
  arrange(-`release year`)

ggplot(data = mydata) +
  geom_point(aes(x = `release year`, y = `user rating score`, na.rm = TRUE, scale = 0.9))
```
